HeroLanding.title: Lightning fast auto valuation
HeroLanding.subtitle: Get a fair and accurate value for your auto in minutes. Swiss and imported vehicles are supported.

Testimonials.c: Discover the glowing feedback from our delighted customers worldwide.

AutoValueForm.title: Please fill in the following details to get your car value.
AutoValueForm.description: Just a few details to get your rapid, accurate valuation

email.label: We won't share your email with anyone

success.title: Valuation submitted
success.description: We'll get back to you soon.

error.title: Something went wrong.
error.description: Your submission request failed. Please try again.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.description: Please confirm your payment details with Stripe

paymentConfirmed.title: Payment confirmed
paymentConfirmed.description: We'll get back to you swiftly at the following contact details.

paymentNotConfirmed.title: Payment not confirmed
paymentNotConfirmed.description: Your payment was not successful. Please click below to try again. Please contact support if the issue persists.

autoInfo.title: Vehicle Information
autoInfo.description: The following information will be used to calculate the value of your vehicle.

phone-entry.title: Please enter your phone number to verify your identity.
phone-entry.description: A passcode will be sent to the following phone number.

passcode.title: Please enter the passcode we sent you.
passcode.description: The passcode was sent to the following phone number.

PricingCards.f: for to contact our support team.
PricingCards.g: You can test the subscriptions and won't be charged.
